artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheet with the score on the recto and verso; from fashion periodical (P.15,499) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of a woman in fashionable dress and her accessories (P.15,497-P.15,498)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Treizième Cahier, 25 Juin 1790
